long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking "Add to Chrome", You accept and agree to installing the Calm Waves Chrome Extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. New Tab Search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.

Calm waves is designed specially to provide comfort and a calming environment while you work. 

The background default consists of two pale, pastel, and relaxing colors that stimulate a small dose of dopamine and serotonin - which reduce stress and anxiety. But, of course, yozu can change those colors, adjust them according to what you like. 

You can customize both - background color and waves color. Let's not forget to mention that the waves are in slight motion that animate your new background. 

We also added your bookmarks under the search bar and completed the whole look of your new tab with discrete details that get along so that your customized browser looks perfect. 

P.S. It's important to state that when you install Calm Waves, you accept and agree to install this extension and set Chrome New Tab to the service’s default, as well as the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Visit our website if you need more information on Calm waves and our work:
